about_the_game:
"Winter is Coming" is an open world survival simulation game independently developed by "mantou", in this game, you will be on an island as an island survival contestant, survive in an island for 100 days and get the final bonus.

Difficult survival

Experience authentic wilderness survival and hunting, using a variety of methods to get food to survive

Day and night alternation

The scene will change according to the change of time, there is a high probability of dangerous creatures at night, please pay attention to safety

Seasonal variation

As time goes by and the weather gets colder, get enough food to last the last winter while it's still cold!

Pattern backpack

You need to allocate the space in your backpack properly to carry more useful items

Quest

You have only one mission

Stay alive!

The game is in the development stage, and the screenshots of the game are not indicative of the final quality

Welcome to contact the author for comments

name: Winter is coming

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win11/10
  • Processor: i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: anything
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: This is my own computer configuration, lower than him have not tried, but can also play (maybe)

short_description: "Winter is Coming" is an open world survival simulation game independently developed by "mantou", in this game, you will be on an island as an island survival contestant, As time goes by and the weather gets colder, Pack enough food to last the last winter before it gets cold enough!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
